name: Super Duncan, the Psychic
description:
PLAY IN FULL SCREEN TO BE ABLE TO READ TEXT: 

Super Duncan, the psychic, is coming to blow your mind.

NOTE: If you are so clever as to have an inkling into the mind of Super Duncan, please say so in a DM rather than in the comments. 

Credits:

Art package: https://maaot.itch.io/mossy-cavern
